snippet.title: UNFAIR - Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
UNFAIR is coming to Steam on October 22th!

UNFAIR is a top-down shooter/RPG. You’ll explore the XNIRL, a program was made for the most obsessed hardcore gamers who desire, above all, to face challenges. Fight against different programs, dodge traps and activate mechanisms to reach and destroy the nasty main program OMEGA, before the red wave reaches the central core.

Follow SOLIDS Studio on:
- Twitter: https://twitter.com/SolidsStudio
- Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/solidsstudio_game/?hl=fr
- Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/SOLIDSStudio/

Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1125930/UNFAIR/

Copyright SOLIDS Studio 2019
